analysis.key_quote: Turning this process over to political appointees who are not experts in these fields and who are instead politically incentivized will cripple public trust in science as well as the science itself, including science that seeks to cure disease and advance public health.
analysis.rationale: The comment expresses strong opposition to the proposed rule by highlighting concerns about politicization of scientific funding and the potential negative impact on scientific integrity and public trust. The emphasis on expert oversight and the dangers of political influence clearly aligns with an anti-rule stance.
